{% for host in routers %}
define host{
    host_name               {{ host.ip }}
    alias                   {{ host.ip }}
    address                 {{ host.ip }}
    use                     dewey_router
}
{% endfor %}
{% for host in hosts %}
define host{
    host_name               {{ host.hostname }}
    alias                   {{ host.shortname }}
    address                 {{ host.hostname }}
    use                     dewey_host
    {% if host.canonical_assignment.network.gateway %}
    parent                  {{ host.canonical_assignment.network.gateway }}
    {% endif %}
}
{% endfor %}
